item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Night Meetup series! This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different restaurant and bar scenes in Providence.

This week's location is:Â  Ladder 133 (http://ladder133.com/)

And yes ... it is open on Monday's once again with the football season.

Great place to watch a Football game, which, with MNF, is Chicago Bears at Dallas Cowboys. Ladder 133 also has some sweet deals at the following below:

http://www.restaurant.com/ladder-133-bar-grill-providence-american-restaurant-pid=45618?zip=02903&pagesize=10&searchradius=10&sorting=Name%20%28Ascending%29&page=4&

or ...

http://www.yelp.com/biz/ladder-133-providence

Be sure to read the fine print with any deal. Noted that limit 1 per table.

Hope to see you there! Bring a friend!

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome... Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever.
item.how_to_find_us: We're a big crowd, can't miss us ...
item.name: Monday Night Meetup - Ladder 133
